node.name: Cinematic Designer (Indigo version)
node.shortdescription:
Cinematic Designer allows the modeling of UI navigation by focusing on the description of Scenario, Flow, Transitions, Actions / Events, and the content of each screens with Widgets.

This module uses a dedicated Cinematic metamodel provided by Obeo Network community and it implements the following diagrams:

  • Package Diagram overview
  • Flow Diagram
  • UI Structure
  • Lays to activate View Containers or Flow Events

This modeling tool can be used in conjunction with other designers:

  • SOA Designer for services
  • Entity Designer for domain model
  • Graal Designer for UI interaction (entry specifications from business specifiers)

You can also generates your application with your own generators or apply this ready-to-use webapp generator: Acceleo JavaEE Generators.

This designer is free (open-source with EPL license).
You can easily modify it with Obeo Designer to adapt each diagram to your needs or combine it to your own DSL. To start customizing this module, just download a free trial version of the architect edition and import the source code of Cinematic Designer from Github.

More details Here.
node.body:
Cinematic Designer allows the modeling of UI navigation by focusing on the description of Scenario, Flow, Transitions, Actions / Events, and the content of each screens with Widgets.

This module uses a dedicated Cinematic metamodel provided by Obeo Network community and it implements the following diagrams:

  • Package Diagram overview
  • Flow Diagram
  • UI Structure
  • Lays to activate View Containers or Flow Events

This modeling tool can be used in conjunction with other designers:

  • SOA Designer for services
  • Entity Designer for domain model
  • Graal Designer for UI interaction (entry specifications from business specifiers)

You can also generates your application with your own generators or apply this ready-to-use webapp generator: Acceleo JavaEE Generators.

This designer is free (open-source with EPL license).
You can easily modify it with Obeo Designer to adapt each diagram to your needs or combine it to your own DSL. To start customizing this module, just download a free trial version of the architect edition and import the source code of Cinematic Designer from Github.

More details Here.
